original_text:
Therefore the land mourns,
    and all who dwell in it languish,
and also the beasts of the field
    and the birds of the heavens,
    and even the fish of the sea are taken away.
korean_text: 그러므로 이 땅이 슬퍼하며 거기 사는 자와 들짐승과 공중에 나는 새가 다 쇠잔할 것이요 바다의 고기도 없어지리라

sentences.original_text: and all who dwell in it languish,
sentences.korean_translation: 그 가운데 거하는 모든 자가 쇠약하며,

sentences.original_text: and also the beasts of the field and the birds of the heavens,
and even the fish of the sea are taken away.
